action.action-desc: Mrs. Lesko introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to reissue the final environmental impact statement for the Resolution Copper Project and Land Exchange, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Unleashing American Resources Act.

section.header: Environmental impact statement for the Resolution Copper Project and Land Exchange

subsection.text: Not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this section, the Secretary of Agriculture shall reissue the final environmental impact statement for the Resolution Copper Project and Land Exchange, which was withdrawn March 5, 2021 (86 Fed. Reg. 12943).
The Secretary of Agriculture may not withdraw the final environmental impact statement reissued under subsection (a).

The final environmental impact statement reissued under subsection (a) shall be considered to meet the requirements relating to detailed statements under section 102(2)(C) of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 (42 U.S.C. 4332(2)(C)) for the Resolution Copper Project and Land Exchange.
